snippet: Follow along with this interactive replay of the second presidential debate, using fact-checks and graphics to take a closer look at attacks and assertions by President Obama and Mitt Romney.
lead_paragraph: Follow along with this interactive replay of the second presidential debate, using fact-checks and graphics to take a closer look at attacks and assertions by President Obama and Mitt Romney.

headline.seo: Complete Video and Fact-Checks From the Second Presidential Debate Between Romney and Obama
